title: SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_THIS_FRAME
content:
0xAAE7CE1D63167423// SetMouseCursorThisFrame
void SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_THIS_FRAME();Sets the mouse pointer to be active on current frame.Old name:  _SHOW_CURSOR_THIS_FRAMEOld name:  _SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_ACTIVE_THIS_FRAMEExamples:LuaCreateThread(function()
  while true do
    Wait(0)
    SetMouseCursorThisFrame()
  end
end)
codeBlocks:
CreateThread(function()
  while true do
    Wait(0)
    SetMouseCursorThisFrame()
  end
end)
